name: Hostal Acuarela

reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights in October 2012. We stayed in a 5 bed dorm, but as we are a group of 4 we had the whole place to ourselves. The beds were warm and comfortable, although oen of our group felt the duvet was a bit smelly and hadn't been washed in a while!
reviews.title: Strange, but in a good way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The strange thing about this hostel is that you are essentially left on your own the whole time. There is one guy who runs the place, thankfully he was there when we arrived otherwise the doors are locked and you're not able to get in. We were the only guests there, he went out for a few hours. During that time a few other travellers knocked at the door, leaving only us to answer it! We explained the guy had popped out and they could wait inside. An hour later he still wasn't back and we had to go out, so we had to ask the other travellers to leave! Very strange, almost like staying in a self catering apartment rather than a hostel.
reviews.title: A boutique hostel

reviews.text: In the morning the breakfast is left out for the guests - bread, fruit and tea/coffee. On the first morning this was fine as it was only us 4 staying there. On the second morning the hostel had more people staying. This meant that when we got up, the plates/cups etc had all been used by other guests.... and of course being a hostel with no staff meant that everything was dirty!
reviews.title: acuarela hostal valparaiso

reviews.text: In my opinion the whole kitchen and lounge area needed a good clean. There were cups and empty beer cans lying around both days.
reviews.title: Feels like home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The good thing was the freedom being left on your own gave us. Nobody to bother us about checkout times, no having to wait for the kitchen etc. As I said before, it was nice being left to ourselves, but at the same time quite strange to not really have anyone working in the hostel.
reviews.title: Great breakfasts

description: We are located in the heart of Cerro Alegre, a World Heritage site, in a pleasant environment friendly and cheerful. We have double rooms $ Us37 and Us15 $ per person sharing. Includes breakfast, use of lounge with cable TV, Computer, Wifi. Terrace with sea view.
